name: Glaceon ex
author: aky CG Works
tera_effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Frost Bullet
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Euclase
attacks.effect: Knock Out 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon that has exactly 6 damage counters on it.

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
